monsters.name: Ankheg
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 11

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the grappled creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

actions.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 ft. long and 5 ft. wide, provided that it has no creature grappled. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Awakened Tree
monsters.languages: one language known by its creator

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortspear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The behtu exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 21 (5d8) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw.

actions.name: Ichorous Infusions
actions.desc: Behtu war parties carry 1d6 vials of ichorous infusions. They often ingest an infusion before an ambush. For the next 2d6 rounds, the behtus gain a +4 bonus to their Strength and Constitution scores and quadruple their base speed (including their climb speed). Behtus also take a -4 penalty to their Intelligence and Wisdom scores for the duration of the infusion. A non-behtu character who ingests a behtu infusion becomes poisoned and takes 10 (3d6) poison damage; a successful DC 14 Constitution saving throw against poison reduces damage to half and negates the poisoned condition.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the centaur moves at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Clockwork Hound
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tripping Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Explosive Core
actions.desc: The mechanism that powers the hound explodes when the construct is destroyed. All creatures within 5 feet of the hound take 7 (2d6) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork hound is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The clockwork hound has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Diligent Tracker
special_abilities.desc: Clockwork hounds are designed to guard areas and track prey. They have advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks when tracking.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

• Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
• 1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ettercap makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained creature can make a DC 11 Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage and immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage.

actions.name: Variant: Web Garrote
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which the ettercap has advantage on the attack roll. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and the ettercap has advantage on attack rolls against it.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Web Sense
special_abilities.desc: While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Tusk
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

monsters.name: Giant Elk
monsters.languages: Giant Elk, understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Grick
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Pegasus
monsters.languages: understands Celestial, Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Swarm of Poisonous Snakes
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: 7 (2d6) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

monsters.name: Wererat
monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft. (rat form only), passive Perception 12

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

actions.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only).
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.

actions.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

monsters.name: Will-o'-Wisp
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, necrotic, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Shock
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

special_abilities.name: Consume Life
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 ft. of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (3d6) hit points.

special_abilities.name: Ephemeral
special_abilities.desc: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Variable Illumination
special_abilities.desc: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.
